name: dataBobCFOdemoLight
description: FINANCE Scenario Agent — AI-powered tool that reads Power BI budget data via DAX, calculates scenario adjustments, and generates SQL INSERT scripts for financial scenario modeling. Built for Hans Kohler AG (company_id=4).
data_layer: Power BI Desktop (DAX queries via MCP), SQLite cache
database: Power BI semantic model (Fakten Hauptbuch), SQLite for caching
conventions: Python 3.11+, async/await with asyncio, Flask HTTP API, MCP protocol for Power BI connection
